description.p: Kalendar is a calendar application allowing you to manage your events and tasks. Kalendar supports both local calendars as well as a multitude of online calendars: Nextcloud, Google® Calendar, Outlook®, Caldav, and many more.

Kalendar gives you many ways to interact with your events. The month view gives you an overview of the entire month. The week view will gives you a detailed hour-by-hour overview of your week and finally the schedule view gives you a list of your upcoming events.
Additionally a tasks view is also available, making it possible to manage your tasks and subtasks thanks to Kalendar's powerful tree view and its customisable filtering capabilities.
Kalendar was built with the idea to be usable on desktop, on mobile and everything in between.
